sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Remote villagers appeal for help after Morocco's earthquake destroyed homes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: More than 2,800 people died with the toll expected to rise.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: More than 2,000 people have been killed with another 6,000 missing as Libya is hit by catastrophic flooding.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: North Korean leader Kim Jong-un arrives in Russia sparking Western fears about a potential arms deal with Moscow the extent of the devastation is becoming apparent as remote villages are reached by the outside world with many small communities flattened survivors are either burying their relatives or working to clear debris to recover more bodies.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: In this mountain village of Imin Ntala, at least 70 people are dead.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Friday's earthquake, the strongest in Morocco in more than a century, killed more than 2,800 people. sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Morocco's government is under pressure to accept more international aid as rescuers battle with exhaustion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: So far, it has accepted help from only four countries, Spain, the UK, Qatar and the United Arab Emirates.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: But the United States, Tunisia, Turkey, Taiwan and France, a former colonial power of Morocco, are some of the nations which are also offering support.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: At least 2,000 people have been killed and several thousands remain missing after catastrophic floods swept through eastern parts of Libya, say officials.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The disaster was triggered by days of torrential rain brought by Storm Daniel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The surging waters overwhelmed flood defences and ageing infrastructure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The city of Derna was among the worst affected areas. years. up to 6,000 people is still unaccounted for as rescuers scale up their efforts the situation is not helped by Libya's internal political chaos with a country split between two rival governments in the east and west North Korean leader Kim jong-un has arrived in Russia, where he's expected to hold a rare

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: meeting with President Vladimir Putin. It's reported he's been accompanied by his top military officials. The visit has sparked Western concerns about a potential arms deal for Moscow's war in Ukraine. It's thought to be Kim's first foreign trip since the COVID-19 pandemic, which had forced the reclusive state to enforce tight borders for more than three years to shield its poor healthcare system.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian and Russian sources described heavy fighting north of Donetsk airport,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: which has been a front line since Russian proxy forces took control of part of Donetsk region in 2014.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Deputy Defence Minister Hanna Mahler confirmed on Monday that Ukrainian forces liberated part of the village of Opetne.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: There it is here the village is lying between of divka and occupied donetsk around three kilometers north of the Donetsk international airport which saw heavy battles when Russian proxy forces attacked the area in 2014 and 2015 according to the Ukrainian head of Avdiivka civil military administration, Vitaly Barabash, Ukrainian forces managed to gain a foothold here. Unofficial Russian accounts acknowledged a withdrawal from the area, meaning Ukrainian forces are drawing close to the Russian-occupied city of Donetsk. The Institute for the Study of War says Russian bloggers claim that the situation in Opetne is not easy and that the fighting is ongoing in urban areas. Over the last few days the UK Defence Ministry said as the elements of the Ukrainian armed forces have advanced into the multi-layered main Russian defensive line east of the town of Roboten here it is highly likely that Russia has redeployed forces from other areas of the front line to replace degraded units around Roboten these redeployments are likely limiting Russia's ability to carry out offensive operations of its own along the other areas of the front line the Institute for the study of war adds the commitment of some of the Russians' military most capable formations for limited counterattacks in this critical sector of the front will likely attrit these formations further.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Passengers and crew of a Russian plane had a lucky escape

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: when it was forced to crash land in a field in Siberia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The Ural Airlines Airbus A320 was on a flight between the Black Sea resort of Sochi and the Siberian city of Omsk when it came down just before 6am Moscow time.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Authorities said the plane had a technical problem and that it landed at a site selected from the air.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Officials have opened a criminal investigation on the possible violation of air traffic safety rules.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Tens of thousands of Catalans marched through the city of Barcelona to mark La Diada, also known as Catalan National Day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: They were demanding independence six years after a failed attempt to break away from Spain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The September 11 rally is the focal point of the wealthy northeast region's separatist movement.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: This year it comes as Madrid remains in political limbo following an inconclusive national election.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Catalan separatist parties hold crucial seats that could help acting Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez continue to govern.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: As every year, the President of the European Commission, Ursula von der Leyen, will deliver her State of the European Union speech.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: On Wednesday, she will explain what has been done during the last year and also highlight the biggest tasks of the upcoming months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ursula von der Leyen prepares her to-do list for the final year of the mandate of this European Commission, probably packed with policy proposals and geopolitical statements.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Euronews correspondents went on the streets of different EU capitals to see how people feel about the European project because at the end this is all about citizens. We asked people on the streets of Athens, Dublin, Rome, Budapest, Madrid, Berlin and Vienna to see what they think the EU should focus on in the coming year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: I think are very important and European Union should focus on it would be definitely climate change and disinformation or combating the Creo que lo más importante es atender a lo que estamos haciendo mal en el Mediterráneo, lo que estamos dejando morir, que algún día cuando pase el tiempo la historia nos avergonzará.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Υπάρχουν προγραμμάτες για αυτοκίνητές, για να φέρουν αυτοκίνητές σε επαναστάσεις με το ΕΕ, με φορές αρκετές αυτοκίνητές ή φλόγες.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Το μεγαλύτερο πρόβλημα είναι η οικονομία.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Εμείς γιατί να είμαστε μια πτωχευμένη οικονομία, τι φταίει αν απαρνουμε την Ελλάδα.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Αλλά βλέπω ότι όλη η Ευρώπη περνάει από τις ίδιες καλένδες. per night, from the same calendars? On people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: Like everything should be concentrated on something next year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Because people have no meaning anymore.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: Why didn't you agree that Ferenc Pápa and Viktor Orban would like to? I mean the inflation level is at crisis point as we both know and the migration is at even more than crisis point.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: Promote any measure that promotes peace.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: He doesn't give, he just loses.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: He still demands that we go with 100 million or so to support Ukraine. Wir wollen, dass wir mit 100 Millionen Euro oder so weit wie möglich mit der Unterstützung der Ukraine zusammenarbeiten.

sentences.sentence: Wir wollen neue Menschen in Europa finden, die sie in Europa attraktiv machen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Thousands of Israeli anti-government protesters rallied outside the Supreme Court on the eve

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: of an historic hearing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Before the court will be a pivotal case against the curbing of the High Court's powers by Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's far-right government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: For the first time in Israeli history, the entire 15-judge bench will sit to hear appeals by rights groups and individuals against the first major part of the overhaul, which the government pushed through Parliament in July.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Nobel Peace Prize winner Maria Ressa has been acquitted of a tax evasion charge that she claims was a politically motivated action at the behest of former President Rodrigo Duterte.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: She and her organization have been fiercely critical of Duterte's violent crackdown on drugs crime, in which thousands of petty criminals in the Philippines were killed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Ressa had previously been cleared of other tax evasion charges.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: She's also appealing to the Supreme Court against a libel conviction.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: She held the latest ruling as a victory for truth and justice.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: The American caver trapped underground in Turkey has been hoisted to safety

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: and after treatment on the surface flown to a hospital.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: 40-year-old Mark Dickey had been trapped underground after suffering from gastrointestinal bleeding on September 2.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: He was more than 1,000 meters below the surface.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: His condition improved after he was given a blood transfusion and then strapped to a stretcher and slowly carried out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: More than 150 people were involved in the international rescue operation.
